Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bianca, I'll probably be out for a mission the next few days.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I see. But you have to obey orders, alright?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We'll see.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where are you heading, Karenina?', 3: '10', 4: 'Is that...?', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Karen just got a purifying order from the headquarters. She's preparing to move out.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Seeing that the commandant is here, why don't you report your leave yourself...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You can take care of that for me, Bianca. I'm out!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Did I do something that made her mad?', 3: '18', 4: 'I feel like I should have approved her leave first.', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You're right, Commandant. But Karen usually got her mission from the headquarters directly.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'They would be above your clearance level.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Karenina is like that to everyone. It's most definitely not your fault, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Although... they did think Karen is better suited for that mission, didn't they...", 4: '2'}
{2: "Aren't you suitable as well?", 3: '21', 4: 'Do you want to go as well?', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Perhaps. I might be the captain, but compared to me, Karenina seems to fit in the Purifying Force even more.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's not it. I'm just reflecting on my approach.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karen would initiate an attack on the target directly in an attempt to finish the mission as soon as possible.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'While I would investigate from multiple fronts without making a judgment call until the very last moment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Maybe that was why they thought I was unsuitable for this mission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'I think your approach is the right one.', 3: '27', 4: "I thought the Purifying Force wouldn't care about evidence.", 5: '28'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "But the Purifying Force doesn't need this kind of mercy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's just me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Do you know what they call me in the Purifying Force, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Fence sitter That's what they say.", 4: '2'}
